title: support ninja irie
body:
akali top zed mid shen jg kenne adc...wtf is ninja support....exactly...
so need a support ninja that can selfcast and buff...eg lulu ,ori nami...
like her moves buff ad damage eg shield like janna...but hass cc stuns or slows and heals...or grans passive lifesteal...
ninja that gives shield and lifesteal an grants ally a slow or a stun...or a tele port allie away...for ingae or escape like tahm or kali...
jus aan idea imean you have full demacian team full noxian teem full yordle team...
knda need full ninja team tbh to mke it viable an balanced...or balance is a fools master...
there is no forbidden techniques...but with balanced steps...lol

replies.body: NAO U GOT IT ALL RONG, SHEN ES TOP LANOUR
The stereotypes reek strong in this thread.
you realise its shen sup? and you could count lee as a ninja because he uses energy

BRO A MONK IS CHINESE NINJA LIKE SAMURAI...ARE JAPENESE THEORFOR EITH THAT LOGIC...LEE IS NOT A NINJA BUT IS A CHINES MONK/MATIAL ARTIST AKA BRUCE LEE...IPMANS FORMER STUDENT WHO BROUGHT WINGHCUN AN MADE MMS IN JEET KUN DO...AN SHEN JG IS VIABLE...

>
> BRO A MONK IS CHINESE NINJA LIKE SAMURAI...ARE JAPENESE THEORFOR EITH THAT LOGIC...LEE IS NOT A NINJA BUT IS A CHINES MONK/MATIAL ARTIST AKA BRUCE LEE...IPMANS FORMER STUDENT WHO BROUGHT WINGHCUN AN MADE MMS IN JEET KUN DO...AN SHEN JG IS VIABLE...

I know shen jg is viable(used to play it in r5s) but so is zed. and I was saying you "could" because he uses energy like the others.
